title: Award-Winning Washington, D.C. Elegance near The White House with Rooftop Pool Bar & Daily Breakfast
description:
If you're looking for contemporary indulgence in the United States' capital, you'll find it at this urban oasis. Close to the trendy boutiques, bars, restaurants and galleries of the renowned 14th Street corridor, this cultural hub promises you plenty of options for exploring.

After a day spent among the many famous landmarks nearby - such as The White House, National Mall and Dupont and Logan Circles - retreat to the comfort of your spacious room, thoughtfully designed to calm your senses and provide a little slice of peace and quiet among the bustle of the city.

Start your day with a coffee on the open-air patio at BPM Coffee & Wine. Enjoy the hotel’s very own gallery, The Salon, which hosts works from local artists, or bask in panoramic views from the rooftop pool and penthouse deck (open seasonally), perfect for days lounging in the sun.
offer_address: 1430 Rhode Island Avenue North West, Washington, D.C. 20005, United States

vendor_name: The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill
title: Modern Washington DC Art Stay near Capitol Hill with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktail & Late Checkout
description:
Experience the best of Washington DC with a stay at this art-inspired retreat in Capitol Hill, moments away from the city's most iconic landmarks such as the Capitol Building and a plethora of Smithsonian museums. Step inside the striking 10-story atrium and gaze across a curated collection of commissioned artworks.

After a long day of exploring America's captivating capital, indulge at Bistro du Jour, the onsite Parisian restaurant offering a robust menu of champagne, inventive cocktails and classic French dishes like steak frites. With supreme convenience and timeless style, The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill is the perfect stay for history-lovers and culture aficionados alike.
location_description: The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill
offer_address: 20 Massachusetts Avenue Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia 20001, United States

title: Award-Winning Washington, D.C. Downtown Art Hotel near The White House with Daily Breakfast Credit
description:
Leave ordinary at the door at this award-winning retreat in downtown Washington, D.C., a ‘herstory’-defining hotel located on vibrant 14th Street, near the trendy neighbourhood of Logan Circle. Just a 15-minute walk from many of the city's most iconic sights, including The White House, this eclectic hotel celebrates female empowerment in all its forms.

Enter and be blown away by thought-provoking art that leaves room for contemplation - including an 8,000-piece art collection, simply titled ‘Her’ - and luxurious settings that invite relaxation at every turn.

Discover U Street and thriving Logan Circle, packed with trendy shops, galleries and distilleries, then return to the hotel and enjoy craft cocktails with a modern twist at Figleaf Bar & Lounge or Hedy's Rooftop (seasonal), where a pool and bar await.
offer_address: 1155 14th Street NW, Washington, D.C. 20005, United States

title: Washington D.C. Elegance in Dupont Circle with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Dining Credit
description:
Step into sophistication at the centre of Washington D.C.'s most storied neighbourhood, Dupont Circle. Nestled amid grand row houses, leafy avenues and lively streets, this timeless hotel is more than just a place to rest - it's a doorway into the nation capital's cultural centre.

The hotel places you at the intersection of old-world charm and contemporary vibrance, with Dupont Circle's eclectic boutiques, art galleries, LGBTQIA+ community and culinary scene at your doorstep, and the historic Embassy Row moments away. Many of D.C.'s most famous political monuments are within easy reach, including The White House, the Smithsonian Museum and the National Mall.

Where Art Deco touches meet sleek modern design, this elegant affair boasts refined rooms and social spaces. The hotel's bar, Doyle, channels mid-century cool with views over Dupont Circle, while The Pembroke's airy terrace invites guests to savour seasonal dishes recognised with a Michelin Key.
offer_address: 1500 New Hampshire Ave NW, Washington, D.C., Washington 20036, United States

title: Grand Heritage Washington D.C. Retreat Moments from the White House with Historic Onsite Bar
description: Experience the grandeur of the USA's capital city with a stay at the iconic InterContinental The Willard Washington D.C., an IHG Hotel. Located just two blocks from the White House, this historic hotel has hosted numerous dignitaries and celebrities since 1818. Savour exquisite French cuisine at Café du Parc or sip classic cocktails at Round Robin Bar, dubbed the 'Oval Office of Bars' by Condé Nast Traveller. For a touch of tranquillity amid the city buzz, retreat to The Willard Spa.
location_description: InterContinental The Willard Washington D.C., an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1401 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC 20004, United States

vendor_name: The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill
title: Contemporary Washington DC Stay near Capitol Hill with Gallery Atrium & French Bistro
description:
Be among the first to enjoy this art-inspired retreat in Capital Hill, just moments from Washington DC’s iconic landmarks. Step into a striking 10-storey atrium where a curated collection of commissioned artworks greets you. Indulge at the onsite Parisian bistro, offering a robust menu of champagne, inventive cocktails and classic French dishes like steak frites.

Once you've explored the hotel, head out and explore the United States' capital. Visit the White House, take a walk from the Washington Monument to the Lincoln Memorial, and then explore one of the many Smithsonian museums.
location_description: The Royal Sonesta Washington, DC Capitol Hill
offer_address: 20 Massachusetts Avenue Northwest, Washington, District of Columbia 20001, United States

title: Harbourfront Washington DC European-Inspired Escape with Rooftop Bar & Pool Terrace
description: Stroll along Washington DC's waterfront and the city's coolest neighbourhood from your base at the Pendry Washington DC - The Wharf, where European-inspired design and breathtaking harbour views are set to delight. When you're not exploring the wonders of The Wharf, take a moment to indulge in one of the three onsite dining venues, whether it's Japanese flavours at rooftop bar Moonraker or a handcrafted cocktail at Bar Pendry.
offer_address: 655 Water Street SW, Washington, DC 20024 United States

title: Art-Inspired Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Washington DC with Rooftop Pool
description:
If you're looking for contemporary indulgence in the US capital, you'll find it at Viceroy Washington DC. This sleek luxury lodging is just steps from the boutiques, bars, restaurants and galleries of 14th Street. Landmarks such as The White House, Dupont and Logan circles, U Street, and the Convention Centre are easily accessible by foot, but should you wish to explore further afield, there’s a Metro station just 10 minutes from the hotel.

Spacious rooms and suites are designed to calm the senses and provide a little slice of peace and quiet among the hustle and bustle of the city. Start your day with a coffee on the open-air patio at BPM Coffee & Wine. Explore the hotel’s very own gallery, The Salon, which hosts works from local artists, or admire the city from above in the rooftop pool and penthouse deck (open seasonally), designed for days lounging in the sun.
offer_address: 1430 Rhode Island Ave NW, Washington, DC 20005, United States

title: Trendy Downtown Washington DC Escape with Rooftop Bar & Live Music Venue
description: Stay at the trendy Eaton DC, a boutique hotel located in vibrant downtown Washington DC. The hotel's culinary offerings are a delight: Michele's restaurant serves up French-American cuisine, while Wild Days rooftop bar and lounge is the place to be for tacos, s'mores and cocktails enjoyed against the atmosphere of live music. For relaxation, retreat to the expansive wellness centre with yoga and meditation on offer, as well as a variety of classes and workshops.
offer_address: 1201 K Street NW , Washington, DC 20005, USA

title: Washington DC Sophisticated Downtown Stay with Rooftop Bar
description: Stay within arm’s reach of Washington DC’s iconic monuments at Kimpton Banneker Hotel, an IHG Hotel, located on a tree-lined avenue with views of The White House. Dine at the timeless French bistro, Le SeL, which tantalises with Parisian flavours, or sip cocktails at the enchanting Lady Bird rooftop bar. Take leisurely strolls through buzzing Dupont Circle and peruse bustling downtown during your Washington DC stay.
location_description: Kimpton Banneker Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1315 16th St Nw, Washington, DC, United States 20036
